title: Usage Details for user {member_name}

params.sql: SELECT target_cat AS "Category", target_type AS "Unit Type", count(*) AS "Kills" FROM MISSIONSTATS WHERE init_id = %(ucid)s AND init_type = %(module)s AND event = 'S_EVENT_KILL' GROUP BY target_cat, target_type ORDER BY 1,2 DESC

footer:
Display is WIP, Guns for instance yet to come.
Values > 100% might be splash damage or incorrectly reported by DCS.
